job.title: Data Scientist, Client Services
job.description: ltstronggtWe Breathe Life Into DataltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAt Komodo Health our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease Smarter use of data is essential to this mission We combine the worlds most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map the industrys most precise view of the US healthcare system With the Healthcare Map as our foundation we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industryltbrgtltbrgtOur people are the center of our success We are a smart supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing whats broken in healthcare Its fun challenging and important Join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Opportunity at Komodo HealthltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Life Science Services teams mission is to support Life Science customers and products through custom applications of our healthcare map along with actionable insights that enable Komodo to meet our business goalsltbrgtltbrgtOur data scientists help build analytics pipelines and complex logic for complicated data projects that solve tangible customer use casesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtLooking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health you will haveltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtDelivered highvalue data analytics projects that our existing data products could not cover ltligtltligtWorked with Product to help prototype new analytics offeringsltligtltligtEffectively partnered with customerfacing teams to reconcile client requirements with the capabilities of datasets available at KHltligtltligtIncorporated a good understanding of the healthcare datasets at Komodo and client usecases to effectively partner with data engineering teams for architectural decisionsltligtltligtCreated a plan with the team to scale our solutions automate code and centralize complex logic Advocated for good engineering practices within the team like documentation and code reusabilityltligtltligtPresented findings insights and analytical results to internal partners for client deliveries as well as the larger DS function for continued growth and learningltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Bring To KomodoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtKeenly analytical mindset and the ability to solve complex problems with limited supervisionltligtltligtExperience writing SQL queries and working with Relational Databases and Proficient in scripting with PythonltligtltligtAbility to work well both independently and collaboratively in a fastpaced and demanding agile environmentltligtltligtInterest in growing their skills as a Data Scientist and being willing to learn and teach as part of a teamltligtltligtStrong business acumen demonstrated by a good understanding of how analytics insights tie into business goalsltligtltligtHigh motivation work ethic and selfdiscipline to organize and complete tasks ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtCuriosity piqued Learn more about usltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtKomodo Health Acquires Breakaway PartnersltligtltligtKomodo Health Secures 220M in Series E funding led by Tiger GloballtligtltligtKomodo Health Acquires Mavens Series D funding led by ICONIQ GrowthltligtltligtWealthfront The 2021 Career Launching Companies ListltligtltligtIn Conversation with Dr Arif Nathoo Komodo Healths CEOltligtltligtKomodo Healths Meet a Dragon seriesltligtltligtKomodos Values that Drive our Cultureltligtltulgt
